Author: Nestle13
Text: If you were exercising to get into the deficit, your body will hold onto a shit ton of water until your muscles repair themselves. I think it’s probably just water weight. I know it’s so hard to see a larger number on a scale, but please give yourself some compassion. I promise, it is very, very unlikely that this is actual weight.

Author: katebishophawkguy
Text: it could be water weight. alcohol and fast food if you had it tends to dehydrates you which makes your body hold on to water
